label: TECHNICAL_SUPPORT
description: Problems using the product, errors, bugs, or performance issues.

label: BILLING_INQUIRY
description: Questions about invoices, payments, subscriptions, refunds, or pricing.

label: SALES
description: Pre-purchase inquiries about features, pricing plans, or demonstrations.

label: ACCOUNT_MANAGEMENT
description: Requests to update personal information, change plans, or cancel an account.

label: GENERAL_FEEDBACK
description: Suggestions, compliments, or general comments not requiring immediate action.
